title.narrative: Increased access to water though RWH

description.narrative: 3R approach in disadvantaged areas of Gorkha district

A catchment-based 3R approach to water supply delivery decreases temporal variability of supply and provides inherent mechanisms to improve both, water quality and quantity, agricultural productivity and adaptation to climate change. It maps opportunities to increase and utilize natural or anthropogenic water storage as a buffer for periods of low rainfall. This approach provides a holistic and integrated approach to WASH Delivery and Education.

A catchment-based 3R approach to water supply delivery decreases temporal variability of supply and provides inherent mechanisms to improve both, water quality and quantity, agricultural productivity and adaptation to climate change. It maps opportunities to increase and utilize natural or anthropogenic water storage as a buffer for periods of low rainfall. This approach provides a holistic and integrated approach to WASH Delivery and Education.

Recently, NEWAH has approached Water, Sanitation and Hygiene implementation utilizing a Village Development Committee (VDC) coverage approach over a longer time-frame of WASH implementation. The use of a catchment-coverage approach to WASH delivery using the principles of 3R through the RAIN Foundation aims to further NEWAHs success in WASH delivery and education by conducting a pilot application of the 3R approach in villages of Tanglichowk VDC.

The overall objective is to increase access to water and micro irrigation system though the rain water harvesting system to the people of the Gorkha district. The specific objectives are: 1. To increased access to water 2. To enhance capacity of the target people 3. To disseminate knowledge and skills

name.narrative: Darbung VDC, Finam VDC, Tanglichok, Ghairung VDC, Namjung

title.narrative: 1119 people will have access to water though community and institutional level RWH systems
2 communities will have to access to improved micro irrigation
492 people will have access to water though the RWH jars
5 communities will have skill on repair and maintenance
